com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof
Class Identifier

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.zrl.idmx.showproof.Identifier

public class Identifier
extends java.lang.Object

Object used to implement identifiers for hidden and revealed values, commitments and verifiable encryptions in the proof specification.

          All possible types of identifiers.
